sample_docs: We are based in Dubai but we've been where you are , all over the U.A.E. We know you need a security contractor who you can trust. Our years of experience in the automation, security and access control fields have earned us reputed clients like Higher college of technology EMIRATES COLLEGE OF FINANCE AND BANKING Home & Business Security Center Protecting your vicinity is a basic human instinct - you've worked hard for what you have. Why would you jeopardize that? At TACS LLC, we're dedicated to providing you true security and peace of mind. When you know you're safe and secure, you can rest easily. With years of experience in the security business, you can trust us to protect your home, family, and business. We set ourselves apart with unwavering integrity and a strict code of ethics. AUTOMATION AND ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEMS Supply all kinds of rfid, uhf cards ,RF remote controls,loop detectors Automatic gate barriers like came ,bft ,nice ,faac, elka Access control system: XPR,LENEL,ZK,HUAKE Sliding gates :CAME,BFT,NICE SOMPFY Biometric systems : ZK,XPR, Speed Gates : Gunnebo,Ozak Turnstiles : Gunnebo, Ozak, Perco Road Blockers : Gunnebo We have long range readers which read from 1 mtr to 15 mtrs

Automatic and manual Bollards Provide perimeter protection whilst also adding contemporary style and elegance to the surrounding landscape. Bollards are available in a number of modern styles, with each bollard available in a variety of length, diameter and capacity options. Bollards are a Easy, costeffective way to ensure high level security for residential area, public and commercial properties, protecting against Unidentified Objects. Bollards can be automatically or manually operated. Manual bollard operates with a key and are an economical solution for installation on an existing road. If we talk aout Installing automatic bollards then it is more complicated as they need a power supply and they work on a hydraulic system. TACS CONTRACTING LLC provides a comprehensive design, planning and installation and maintainence service, carried out by our experience, professional engineers. We also maintain and service existing bollards. We will provide you with a free, fixed-cost quotation for all repairs to automated and Manual Bollards in UAE . We also repair access control systems. TACS CONTRACTING LLC have simple, easy to use systems to suit every Budget. With our clients in mind, we have a number of verities related to Automatic and Manual Bollards . We are always happy to talk through your requirement with you.

Door Access Control Systems in Dubai Tacsllc.com is the leading supplier of world-class door access control systems in Dubai . We are the dealers of ZKTCO, Suprema, RBH, HID, Matrix, Gallagher, Continental, RFID, Farpointe , and Turnstile Access control systems in Dubai. We are providing single-door access control systems and standalone security door access control systems with web-based reports in UAE. Our security access control systems can be easily integrated with time attendance software. TACS Contracting LLC is based in Dubai, and we are providing superior quality door security solutions to our clients including biometric, fingerprint, IRIS, face recognition and RFID access control systems. If you are looking for an access control installation company in Dubai that can install security door systems at an affordable cost TACS Contracting LLC is the best option for you. We are having best quality access control brands suitable for any budget company. We are also undertaking a Maintenance Contract also in Dubai We provide Access Control Systems in Dubai, UAE like RFID Card Readers, ESMART readers, UHF Readers, Biometric readers, Face Recognition, and Keypad Reader Access in Dubai for buildings, apartments, offices, and villas. Are available in short proximity range and long-range as required. They also read mobile Bluetooth and WIFI including QR codes. Further, our cards are manufactured employing superior grade material and advanced technologies. The device comes with fully loaded functionality which can be used as a security product with trust. The stability of the device proves that it can work in any condition in office and factory areas. Esmart readers are used to sending and revoking virtual access control cards to smartphones in any security or parking application. This expansion and enhancement of the mobile access control platform offer almost unlimited potential for integration and effective use. UHF Reader is a long-range sleek and compact next-generation RFID reader powered with an 8 DBI linear polarized integrated antenna to facilitate a fast and accurate tag identification process. Biometric Reader is a futuristic fingerprint reader to meet the functional and aesthetic needs of any organization for access control and time attendance applications. Its touch-sense large display facilities icon-based graphical user interface supports time attendance functions with intuitive user interaction. It helps both small and large security businesses with a wide range of products in the most affordable and seamless way, helping them set their credibility in the business. We create a single-point window where all the digital security solutions come with best-in-class technology and assured service support to offer its channel partners unfazed success and growth opportunities. Keypad Reader with LCD Display is a standalone model reader, it can be used for Access Control System thru PIN or Card authorization, where the security for your entry or exit will be moved to a high level. Please contact 0971-526299069 or email: melwin@tacsllc.com for inquiries and prices for supplying, installing, commissioning, and maintaining Door Access Control Systems in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, UAE, and entire the Middle East and Africa.
